experiences.title: AI/ML Engineer
experiences.subtitle: SimpleRishta
workDescription: Enhanced user matching accuracy by 30% through the development of a Recommendation System that utilized a decade’s worth of attribute-rich data, resulting in a 60% reduction in search time and a 25% increase in the user base, employing Spring Boot, Python, Random Forest, PostgreSQL, and scikit-learn.

Achieved a 40% increase in data validation accuracy by implementing a micro-service that validates user data and images against ID cards, as measured by a 25% reduction in fraudulent profiles and a 70% decrease in inappropriate content incidents using Python, face recognition technologies, transformers, and Django.

experiences.title: SaaS Architect
experiences.subtitle: AQUSys Intelligence
workDescription: Architected a scalable AI-powered SaaS platform that automates interviews through real-time voice interactions, dynamic question generation using LangChain and LLaMA 3.0, and candidate evaluation pipelines via Whisper transcription and AI scoring.

Attained a 30% increase in efficiency by developing real-time dynamic question generation and adaptive evaluation strategies using RAG and Transformer models, leading to improved candidate response accuracy.
Optimized system performance and reduced candidate processing time by 40% through asynchronous WebSocket communication, FastAPI microservices, and multi-threaded evaluation modules.
Boosted candidate engagement by 25% through customizable interview flows, utilizing context-aware questioning along with speech and facial expression analysis using SpeechRecognition and OpenCV.
Enhanced overall interview-to-hire efficiency by 30%, enabling scalable and unbiased hiring workflows for organizations.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: AI Travel Recommender
workDescription: Developed a personalized travel planning system that achieves a response time of 100ms through the integration of hybrid recommendation techniques, including popularity-based, content-based, and collaborative filtering methods.
Designed an intuitive GUI with customkinder for seamless navigation, visualizing recommendations using tkintermapview, and adapting suggestions based on individual user preferences.
Recognized as one of the Top 3 Projects of the semester for achieving the lowest latency and exceptional design.

experiences.title: Project Developer
experiences.subtitle: Speedy Drop
workDescription: Engineered a cross-platform app facilitating 30-minute deliveries within a 10km radius, leveraging Flutter and Firebase to connect local vendors with consumers.
Crafted an intuitive interface featuring secure authentication, real-time order tracking, and streamlined purchasing, incorporating Flutter Maps for optimized route management.
Devised a rider-based delivery model with a flexible pricing strategy to encourage prompt deliveries, reducing operational overhead for sellers.
